ing: 1/3 cup milk, or more to taste
des: "Who doesn't like a mango lassi, right? But when you don't have good fresh mangos or can't find mango puree, why not try a banana lassi? I ordered 2 in a restaurant in Udaipur because they were so good and it was because they had no mangos at the time -- what a find!"
ins: Blend bananas, yogurt, milk, ice cubes, and sugar together in a blender until smooth.
